mapper.sql: fo.order_id as orderId, fo.order_time as orderTime, fo.take_time as takeTime, fo.is_finish as isFinish, f.food_name as foodName, fo.order_number as orderNumber, f.food_price as foodPrice, s.student_name as studentName, fo.send_time as sendTime, s.student_telephone as studentTelephone, s.student_address as studentAddress
mapper.update: update forder set is_finish = 1, finish_time = #{finishTime} where order_id = #{orderId}
update forder set is_finish = 1, sender_id = #{senderId}, finish_time = #{finishTime} where order_id = #{orderId}
update sender set send_number = send_number + 1 where sender_id = #{senderId}
mapper.select: select from forder fo inner join food f on fo.food_id = f.food_id inner join student s on fo.student_id = s.student_id inner join seller se on se.seller_id = f.seller_id where se.seller_id = #{sellerId} and fo.is_send = 0 and fo.is_finish = 1 and se.is_delete = 0 and f.is_delete = 0 and s.is_delete = 0 Order By fo.take_time desc limit #{pageNum}, #{pageSize}
